verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ayic ay in och t'a somk'olal ix in awaj t'ayach, a achxo ix ach tak'wi t'ayin.
Mamin, colinel t'a lolonel manh yeloc syal heb' naumk'e lolonel t'a in patic.
Ex esalwum, ¿tom manh ol yak'cot yaelal Dios t'a eyib'anh yujto tze nachaanh lolonel chi'?
Ol jawok niwan yaelal t'a eyib'anh, ichato ol ex juljoc t'a jul-lab' jay snhi', ma ichato ol ex tz'ab'at yuj tzak'ak' chacxililnac.
Ob'iltac in, wal schucal juntzanh anima b'aj cajan in tik. Ek'b'al schucal heb' t'a heb' aj Mesec, ma t'a heb' aj Cedar.
Najtilxo cajan in ek' t'a skal heb' malaj snib'ej t'a junk'olal.
Ha in tik, malaj in gana t'a owal, ayic swalanel lolonel yic junk'olal t'a skal heb', haxo owal snib'ej heb'.
